name: Tap Tap - Coloring Book
description:
Color and relax with an incredible drawing game Tap Tap - Coloring Book! Relieve your stress just in a few taps. Simply follow the dots and reveal the huge collection of free pictures.
If you're tired of color by number games, and looking for something easy, play now an addictive color mania game - Tap Tap - Coloring Book!

3 steps to paint pictures and relax:

- Tap dots
- Color zones
- Enjoy your beautiful art work!

Highlights:
- Easy to color by dots.
- Fun to reveal the art.
- Choose from plenty of free & beautiful art collections.
- Enjoy with the whole family: coloring book for all ages.
- Simple color therapy - stress relief painting game.
- Share your art work with friends on Instagram, Facebook or Messenger.

Coloring art is so easy and fun! Tap Tap dots and color the picture! Try it and keep calm!


SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS

Upgrade Tap Tap - Coloring Book to the Premium version and unlock all pictures, get rid of interstitials and banner ads:

- 1-week recurring subscription for $7.99 after 3-day free trial.

*The price is for US customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.
*Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
*Subscription will be automatically renewed for the same price and duration period, auto-renew can be turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
*Your account will be charged for the subscription fee within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period for the price initially selected.
*Subscriptions may be managed by you and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's iTunes Account Settings.
*Unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when a user decides to subscribe.
